properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder to a Haystack Kafka topic.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kafka.broker-url
properties.description: Url for the Kafka broker for Haystack, for example 'kafka-service:9092'.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.haystack.kafka.topic
properties.description: Name of the Haystack's Kafka topic.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.logging.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder that simply logs incoming spans.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.logging.log-full-span
properties.description: When true, logs the entire content of the span received. When false only the id is logged.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.enabled
properties.description: When true, creates a forwarder that publishes spans into a Zipkin collector.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.host
properties.description: Host for the remote Zipkin collector, for example 'localhost'.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.port
properties.description: Port used by the remote Zipkin collector'.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.max-inflight-requests
properties.description: Maximum in flight requests for Zipkin http client.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.write-timeout-millis
properties.description: Write timeout for Zipkin http client, in milliseconds.

properties.name: pitchfork.forwarders.zipkin.compression-enabled
properties.description: Compresses spans before sending to remote Zipkin collector.
